description: This file defines the React component 'NotesPage', which composes the main notes interface including navigation, sidebar, and editor. It manages local and remote notes, handles fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, and toggles between local storage and backend API based on environment configuration.

methods.name: NotesPage
methods.description: Main React component that renders the notes application, managing state and interactions for notes, including remote and local storage options.
